fr.sii.ogham.email.sender.impl.sendgrid.client

Interface SendGridClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegateSendGridClient

    public interface SendGridClient
    Description of the operations a service backed with SendGrid should expose.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(com.sendgrid.SendGrid.Email email)
      Sends the provided email to SendGrid.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(com.sendgrid.SendGrid.Email email)
   throws com.sendgrid.SendGridException
        Sends the provided email to SendGrid.
        Parameters:
        email - the email to send, cannot be null
        Throws:
        com.sendgrid.SendGridException - an unexpected error occurred when trying to send the email
